TABLE.NAME: hub_site_directory
TABLE.COMMENT: Sites registered into the hub server

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: site name

FIELD.NAME: description
FIELD.COMMENT: site description

FIELD.NAME: url
FIELD.COMMENT: site root url

FIELD.NAME: secret
FIELD.COMMENT: the site secret

FIELD.NAME: trusted
FIELD.COMMENT: when a site is trusted, then the courses are automatically updated

FIELD.NAME: language
FIELD.COMMENT: default lang of the site

FIELD.NAME: timeregistered
FIELD.COMMENT: time the site has been registered (first time)

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: the last time the site information has been updated

FIELD.NAME: timevalidationfailed
FIELD.COMMENT: last time the validation failed (test if the site is available)

FIELD.NAME: contactname
FIELD.COMMENT: name of the site administrator

FIELD.NAME: contactemail
FIELD.COMMENT: site admin email

FIELD.NAME: contactphone
FIELD.COMMENT: site admin phone

FIELD.NAME: contactable
FIELD.COMMENT: set to yes if user can contact the admin from a contact form

FIELD.NAME: imageurl
FIELD.COMMENT: url of the site logo

FIELD.NAME: visible
FIELD.COMMENT: if the site is visible (previously 'confirm' field)

FIELD.NAME: prioritise
FIELD.COMMENT: if set to yes, the site would be displayed at the top of the list

FIELD.NAME: countrycode
FIELD.COMMENT: the ISO country code

FIELD.NAME: regioncode
FIELD.COMMENT: the region code following the ISO 3166-2 standard

FIELD.NAME: street
FIELD.COMMENT: street address

FIELD.NAME: geolocation
FIELD.COMMENT: the geolocation number

FIELD.NAME: moodleversion
FIELD.COMMENT: the current moodle version of the site

FIELD.NAME: moodlerelease
FIELD.COMMENT: the current moodle release

FIELD.NAME: ip
FIELD.COMMENT: the last IP (updated after a valid validation)

FIELD.NAME: courses
FIELD.COMMENT: number of courses, -1 if unknown

FIELD.NAME: users
FIELD.COMMENT: number of users, -1 if unknown

FIELD.NAME: enrolments
FIELD.COMMENT: number of enrolment, -1 if unknown

FIELD.NAME: resources
FIELD.COMMENT: number of resources, -1 if unknown

FIELD.NAME: questions
FIELD.COMMENT: number of questions, -1 if unknown

FIELD.NAME: modulenumberaverage
FIELD.COMMENT: average number of course modules (in non-empty courses)

FIELD.NAME: emailalert
FIELD.COMMENT: set to 1 to receive hub alert email

FIELD.NAME: privacy
FIELD.COMMENT: this is the privacy setting of this site on the hub

FIELD.NAME: posts
FIELD.COMMENT: number of posts into the site

FIELD.NAME: participantnumberaverage
FIELD.COMMENT: average number of participants (in non-empty courses)

FIELD.NAME: deleted
FIELD.COMMENT: 1 if the site is unregistered

FIELD.NAME: publicationmax
FIELD.COMMENT: the maximum number of publication a day for this site. If null, the value is taken from the hub setting.

FIELD.NAME: badges
FIELD.COMMENT: number of badges available in the site, -1 if unknown

FIELD.NAME: issuedbadges
FIELD.COMMENT: number of issued badges, -1 if unknown

FIELD.NAME: mobileservicesenabled
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether mobile services are enabled in the site, -1 if unknown

FIELD.NAME: mobilenotificacionsenabled
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether mobile notifications are enabled in the site, -1 if unknown

FIELD.NAME: registereduserdevices
FIELD.COMMENT: Number of users registered devices in the site, -1 if unknown

FIELD.NAME: registeredactiveuserdevices
FIELD.COMMENT: Number of active users registered devices in the site, -1 if unknown

FIELD.NAME: siteid
FIELD.COMMENT: the site where the course come from

FIELD.NAME: sitecourseid
FIELD.COMMENT: course id on the site => siteid + sitecourseid are the unique identifier of this table for enrollable type. Several downloadable type can have the same siteid+ sitecourseid

FIELD.NAME: contributornames
FIELD.COMMENT: course manager names or whoever the publisher nominates, separated by commas

FIELD.NAME: coverage
FIELD.COMMENT: user tags

FIELD.NAME: creatorname
FIELD.COMMENT: main teacher name or copyright holder or whoever the publisher nominates

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: ate this was last published/updated

FIELD.NAME: description
FIELD.COMMENT: course description

FIELD.NAME: format
FIELD.COMMENT: mbz / url

FIELD.NAME: shortname
FIELD.COMMENT: course shortname (unique on the original site)

FIELD.NAME: language
FIELD.COMMENT: based on lang.php

FIELD.NAME: publishername
FIELD.COMMENT: the name of the person who caused this record to be entered here

FIELD.NAME: licenceshortname
FIELD.COMMENT: one of a standard set of open source, creative commons and other licenses

FIELD.NAME: courseurl
FIELD.COMMENT: original URL of the course

FIELD.NAME: subject
FIELD.COMMENT: The best-matching item from Course Standard Tags

FIELD.NAME: fullname
FIELD.COMMENT: ourse fullname

FIELD.NAME: audience
FIELD.COMMENT: Educators | Students | Admins

FIELD.NAME: educationallevel
FIELD.COMMENT: ducational level being discussed (for educators audience only): Tertiary | Secondary | Primary | Government | Corporate | Association | Other

FIELD.NAME: coursemapid
FIELD.COMMENT: Simple XML description of course structure, could be rendered graphically later CompendiumLD

FIELD.NAME: creatornotes
FIELD.COMMENT: describes how to use the course, where it came from, context, more description etc

FIELD.NAME: creatornotesformat
FIELD.COMMENT: HTML etc

FIELD.NAME: downloadurl
FIELD.COMMENT: usually a local cached mbz but could be anything else, including empty for non-downloadable

FIELD.NAME: originaldownloadurl
FIELD.COMMENT: usually a download script on the original Moodle site, used by Hub to get cache

FIELD.NAME: demourl
FIELD.COMMENT: a URL, if any, where the course can be seen in action

FIELD.NAME: enrollable
FIELD.COMMENT: Is the course enrollable anyone with an account?

FIELD.NAME: publisheremail
FIELD.COMMENT: The email of the publisher

FIELD.NAME: deleted
FIELD.COMMENT: 1 if the course has been deleted from the course directory (unpublished/unregistered)

FIELD.NAME: screenshots
FIELD.COMMENT: The number of screenshots

FIELD.NAME: timepublished
FIELD.COMMENT: the first time the course has been published

TABLE.NAME: hub_course_feedbacks
TABLE.COMMENT: Course feedbacks. A feedback is message sent to the publisher

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: the user that wrote the feedback

FIELD.NAME: time
FIELD.COMMENT: the time when the feedback was created

FIELD.NAME: senttouserid
FIELD.COMMENT: user id to who the message is sent

FIELD.NAME: senttoemail
FIELD.COMMENT: email where the message has been sent

TABLE.NAME: hub_course_contents
TABLE.COMMENT: Course content. A content can be activities, resources, forum, blocks,..

TABLE.NAME: hub_communications
TABLE.COMMENT: All token known by the site in order to communicate between all different entities

FIELD.NAME: type
FIELD.COMMENT: the type of communication SERVER or CLIENT

FIELD.NAME: remotename
FIELD.COMMENT: Name of the remote entity

FIELD.NAME: deleted
FIELD.COMMENT: 1 if ever the site has been unregistered

FIELD.NAME: siteurl
FIELD.COMMENT: the site url when the token was declared stolen

FIELD.NAME: blockeddate
FIELD.COMMENT: the timestamp when the secret was declared stolen
